content.rendered: The Promise: The Darkness on the Edge of Town Story has won the Grammy for Best Boxed or Special Limited Edition Package. Congratulations to Dave Bett and Michelle Holme, Art Directors!

excerpt.rendered: The Promise: The Darkness on the Edge of Town Story has won the Grammy for Best Boxed or Special Limited Edition Package. Congratulations to Dave Bett and Michelle Holme, Art Directors!
